憻字的基本解释

憻
tǎn
古同“坦”。

憻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǎn］
［《廣韻》他但切，上旱，透。］
亦作“憻1”。
(1)平直；广阔。
(2)谓铲平。
(3)显豁；光亮。
(4)敞开。参见“坦懷”。
(5)直率开朗。
(6)露出。吐露。参见“坦白”。
(7)姓。宋代有坦中庸。

憻字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憻； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页404第44
【篇海】他旦切。與坦同。寬也，明也。亦平安也。出佛經。

憻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
憻字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
tǎn
Gu Tong "tan".
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǎn］
["Guangyun" He is cut, dry and thorough. ]
Also known as "憻1".
(1) Straight; broad.
(2) It is called leveling.
(3) Extensive; bright.
(4) Open. See "Tanhuai".
(5) Straightforward and cheerful.
(6) Expose. reveal. See "confession".
(7) Last name. In the Song Dynasty, there was Tan Zhongyong.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憻; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 404 44
[Pianhai] He cuts hard. Same as Tan. Broad also, Ming also. It's safe too. Out of the Buddhist scriptures.
